txt.en: Noontime, 42nd Day of my Exile\n\nA remarkable discovery this morning! I woke to find the Warg nearly broken out of his cage! He was so frenzied that I feared he had the frothing sickness. When I approached the beast and caught his scent I realized what had happened. The crystals! They somehow seeped power into him! Driving him mad, yes, but also enhancing his strength! Whatever the spell was that Galachán made me recite over the crystals seems to have changed something of their nature. This requires further study.
